rooms.description: Spacious Scandinavian design living room with natural light and minimalistic decor.
Open dining space integrated with the living room, ideal for Scandinavian aesthetics.
Modern kitchen designed with clean lines and high functionality, incorporating Scandinavian style.
Guest bedroom with minimalist Scandinavian design and natural ventilation.
Servant's quarters located in the ground floor ensuring privacy, functionality and Vastu alignment.
Utility storage area with integrated cabinetry following Scandinavian design principles.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to welcome positive energy, aligned with Vastu.
Large windows installed to maximize natural light and ensure proper ventilation throughout the house.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom, Scandinavian minimalism, and ample natural light.
Additional bedroom with serene design following Scandinavian style, designed for family use.
Third bedroom offering privacy and comfort with a Scandinavian layout.
Fourth bedroom designed for additional family members or guests, with clean lines and natural light.
Fully-equipped private gym area integrated within the home, designed in a Scandinavian style with ample space for exercise equipment.
Ensuite bathroom adjacent to master bedroom.

openings.description: Balconies for bedrooms ensuring privacy and a connection with nature, aligned with Vastu.
Skylights installed to enhance natural light in interior spaces, promoting a Scandinavian ambience.
